definition.text: Kucoin is tested for data mining and for live trading.

paragraphs.text: 1-min OHLCVs Capability: Yes. The ability to fetch historic data for backtesting purposes has been verified.
Trading Capability: Yes. The ability to run strategies in live-trading mode has been verified.
Comments: This exchange has not yet fully tested but I'm currently live trading on SHIB-USDT pair. I will update this section when I will have had the opportunity to do a more in-depth test

Possible Issues: Kucoin is have an issue where is will randomly kick out the data-mine with error "rateLimitExceeded". When this occurs use maxRate in the configuration as shown below. If this error does not happen for you then you can leave out maxRate .
